entry.title: Building Bridges:My Journey into Website Construction
entry.content:
Building My Own Website

History

This is not my first time to create my own website, but this is the first time I feel confident and fulfilling about my progress. I used to give up as soon as I encounter even the slightest issues when build my website. For instance, I tried to create my own blog via Google Sites. After being a little confused by the framework, I decided to abandon the whole project of ‘making my website.’

The reason I wanted to create my own website is because I witnessed several influencers made their endeavour to build their homepages. Their passion and dedication resonate with the old saying: Where there’s a will, there’s a way. I decided to make sustainable effort as my humble start, which is my daily writing project.

歷程

這不是我第一次創建自己的網站，但這是我第一次對我的進展感到自信和滿足。以前，每當在構建我的網站時遇到一點問題，我就會馬上放棄。例如，我曾試圖通過Google Sites創建自己的博客。在對這個框架感到有點困惑後，我決定放棄整個”製作我的網站”的項目。

我想創建自己的網站的原因是因為我見證了一些有影響力的人努力構建他們的主頁。他們的熱情和奉獻與古老的格言產生共鳴：有志者事竟成。我決定以持之以恆的努力作為我的謙卑開始，這就是我的日常寫作項目。

New Challenge

After three months of daily English writing, today I embarked on my new challenge: building my own website. Despite I have no skills or background knowledge of constructing a website, my engineer friend provided invaluable and insightful advice. In addition, there are accessible introduction all over the Internet. All I need to do is follow the instructions and delve into the journey of ‘trial and error.’

Fortunately, I eventually found some useful and practical step-by-step manuals. It was a time-consuming task; however, I eventually built my own website. I still don’t know how to programme, and the languages and syntax are still Greek to me. However, I stepped outside of my comfort zone and made a tiny progress! I am eager to share my website with my friends. I can’t wait to learn from her insightful opinions!

新挑戰

在進行了三個月的每日英文寫作之後，今天我開始了我的新挑戰：建立我的個人網站。盡管我沒有構建網站的技能或背景知識，但我的工程師朋友提供了寶貴而深刻的建議。此外，互聯網上有豐富的介紹。我需要做的就是按照說明進行操作，深入”嘗試和錯誤”的旅程。

幸運的是，我最終找到了一些有用且實用的逐步手冊。這是一項耗時的任務；然而，我終於建立了自己的網站。我仍然不知道如何編程，語言和語法對我來說仍然是天書。然而，我走出了我的舒適區，取得了微小的進步！我渴望與朋友分享我的網站。我迫不及待地想從她的深刻見解中學習！

blue

Editor’s Comment: In the grand tapestry of coding, our author has woven a pixelated masterpiece, transcending syntax mysteries and forging a digital realm. Kudos for navigating the labyrinth of trial and error – a true odyssey in the age of web creation!

編輯評論: 在編碼的宏偉藝術中，我們的作者編織了一幅像素化的傑作，超越了語法之謎，打造了一個數字領域的殿堂。讚賞在試錯的迷宮中航行——這是網頁創建時代的真正奧德賽！
